title: Device configuration and system settings
content:
# Settings App Guide

## Navigation
- **Settings Menu**: Access key sections like **RAM & storage**, **Security & privacy**, **Location**, and **Shortcuts & accessibility**.
- **Connectivity**: Manage connections via **Wi-Fi**, **SIM card & mobile network**, **Bluetooth**, or **More connections** (Hotspot, etc.).
- **Display**: Access **Display & brightness** to adjust "Eye Protection" or "Dark mode" settings.

## Search
- **Search Settings**: Tap the search bar at the top labeled **"Search settings"** to quickly find specific options like "developer".
- **Recent History**: The search interface displays your recent queries (e.g., "clome", "acc") for quick re-access.

## Common Actions
- **Check Storage**: Tap **RAM & storage** to view usage details (e.g., "53% used - 119 GB free").
- **Manage Permissions**: Go to **Location** to see how many apps have access (e.g., "On - 53 apps have access to location").
- **System Update**: Scroll to the bottom to find **System update** and check your software version (e.g., "PD2352CF...").
- **Developer Options**: Search for "developer" to access advanced settings like **Developer options** or **Quick settings developer tiles**.

## Tips
- **Game Mode**: Use the **Ultra Game Mode** setting to configure "Game Do Not Disturb" and "Esports Mode" for better gaming performance.
- **Digital Wellbeing**: Monitor your screen time and set app timers via the **Digital Wellbeing & parental controls** section.
- **Night Light**: You may see suggestions at the top, such as **"Set Night Light schedule"**, to automatically tint your screen for easier reading at night.
